name: IT201_Project1_Ian_Concepcion
description:
Ian Concepcion IT201 Project 1

Four Features:

Feature 1: Spawn objects on click at mouse position

Feature 2: Display current mouse position as x,y coordinates

Feature 3: "Destroy Button" that clears the scene of user-created game objects when pressed.

Feature 4: Dropdown in the User Interface that allows the user to select the type of object to be spawned from the available options.
